channel.title: updates on Monaparty Portal | Crypto asset platform based on Counterparty, Monacoin
channel.description: Recent content in updates on Monaparty Portal | Crypto asset platform based on Counterparty, Monacoin

item.title: A Helm chart for IPFS-cluster released
item.description: Hello Monaparty folks, We’re happy to release new functionariry for the Monaparty eco-system. We’ve published a Helm chart for the high availability IPFS cluster. Currently it’s on a “preview” state. But we hope it will work fine almost all envs. The chart itself doesn’t any pins to impotant content for Monaparty. Some more hacks are required. We’re working to release a Monaparty integration such as Countertable. Please feel free to send any requests for this new subproject via GitHub.

item.title: indexd-server is updated to 0.0.2
item.description: Monaparty version of indexd-server was updated to 0.0.2. This includes an usability bug fix. https://github.com/monaparty/indexd-server/pull/2 This was applied both of the develop branch and the master branch. For wallet users There is no need to action. Please wait until servers are updated. For node maintainers Please upgrade your indexd-servers like this. fednode rebuild indexd fednode rebuild indexd-testnet In this time, you don’t need to run fednode update. There is no reparse job running.
